professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in database administration, backup/recovery, migration, security patches, and performance tuning.

key_responsibilities: Administering Oracle databases in a high-availability and disaster-recovery environment.
Performing regular maintenance tasks such as backup and recovery using RMAN
Migrating and consolidating databases using Oracle 12c multitenant technology.
and One-off Patches using runInstaller and Perl-based utilities like opatch.
Tuning database performance by optimizing I/O
as well as tuning SQL and SGA/Shared Pool settings using tools like EXPLAIN PLAN

SQL",
